name: @appzmonster/msal-token-interceptor
description: A fetch request interceptor that automatically handles auth token exchange and bearer token header injection. The library uses MSAL by Microsoft

scripts.prebuild: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp ./package.json dist && cp ./README.md dist && cp ./LICENSE dist && cp ./CHANGELOG.md dist
scripts.publish:npm: npm run build && cd dist && npm publish --access public
